Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I lowkey don't trust GenAI, it's really useful, but it's incorrect enough of the time for it to be unreliable

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher marks my work so I take their feedback as fact. At the end of the day, its not GenAI who gives me my mark so it's feedback is not that useful to me

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Differences are pretty big, often times there is not really a lot of overlap between their feedback. GenAI focuses on stuff thats pretty unimportant
